discussion.p: When the EmplaceConstructible requirement is used to initialize an object, direct initialization occurs, i.e. the argument list needs to match a constructor. Initializing an aggregate or using a std::initializer_list constructor with emplace (or other initialization by perfect forwarding) requires naming the initialized type and moving a temporary.
